election_record.label: Mississippi 1805 U.S. House of Representatives (Territorial Delegate)

admin_unit.name: Mississippi
admin_unit.note: "Neither of the above candidates having a majority of the whole electors present, the speaker of the house of representitives directed the electors to proceed to a seventh ballot." The Orleans Gazette, For the Country (New Orleans, LA). February 9, 1805.
The legislature could not come to a consensus, so they adjourned and met later in August.

election_record.reference: The Orleans Gazette, For the Country (New Orleans, LA). February 9, 1805.
